FuncDef: The reset isis error command clears information about incorrect LSPs and Hello packets. The reset isis error command clears information about incorrect LSPs and Hello packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the incorrect LSPs and Hello packets of an IS-IS process.
By default, information about incorrect LSPs and Hello packets received by all processes is cleared.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Clears the incorrect LSPs and Hello packets of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Clears the incorrect LSPs and Hello packets of an interface.
-

Clears the incorrect LSPs and Hello packets of an interface.
-
